card.p1: I have an illness called Celiac Disease and have to follow a strict gluten free diet.
card.p2: I may therefore become very ill if I eat food containing flours or grains of wheat, rye, barley and oats.
card.p3: Does this food contain flour or grains of wheat, rye, barley or oats? If you are at all uncertain about what the food contains, please tell me.
card.p4: I can eat food containing rice, maize, potatoes, all kinds of vegetables and fruit, eggs, cheese, milk, meat and fish - as long as they are not cooked with wheat flour, batter, breadcrumbs or sauce.
